entities.description: The final age variable, determined using the birthdate and interview date.
The number of times the respondent has been married.
Indicates whether the respondent has ever been in the United States Armed Forces.
The current military status of the respondent, including reserve component or retired.

relationships.description: Relates the respondent to their final edited age category.
Indicates the number of times the respondent has been married.
Indicates whether the respondent has ever been in the US Armed Forces.
Relates the respondent to their current military status.
